info.name: minimuTweet Custom v0.71a
info.description:
This isn't finished. The CSS is really all over the place and no options are enabled. The end-intention is a customizable style. The final version may be a Greasemonkey script. NOTE: This will most-certainly-very-likely lag on lower-end machines. Features:
  • Single-column tweet stream
  • Removed Trending, Who2Follow, Profile cards
  • Background "muter"
    • Dim background images
    • One "universal", one for Profile Pages
    • Second background image (Profile page, universal, hardcoded as of v0.7a)
  • Gallery-view mods
    • Vertically align small images to center
    • Innermost expansion displays actual size
  • Removal of header's bar (Profile pages, universal)
    • Updates will be scarce and erratic. No actual support of any sort will be provided, though you can complain to me on twitter @mugeca Or show me what you've done with it.
info.additionalInfo:
Todo, known Issues, bugs, etc.
  • Issue 1:
    • Visibility issues depending on some color schemes. This is from the muter itself causing clashing with a user's set theme color (ie grey on white). Example: http://puu.sh/eaJB7.png
    • Possible solutions: - Force user colors (I'd rather not) - Disable the muter and re-enable defaults on other pages (breaks theming in the first place).
    • Hopefully I'll be able to analyze user colors in javascript and automatically apply a muter color/tone that works.
  • Todo
    • Customizability
    • This might require effort. How terrifying! Of course, I'd like to try making a javascript themer this time around rather than rely on userscript's page to insert colors and whatnot.
    • Changelog
      • 2015/01/07 (v0.71a) - Fixed issue with permalink view not showing images - Changed a few colors
      • 2015/01/06 (v0.7a) - Added things that I didn't keep track of. - First "release" version.
      • 2015/01/04 (v0.01) Initial version
